## Background

-   Research shows people deliberately subject themselves to negative stimuli, suggesting a behavioral preference for such stimuli @kerr2019voluntary; @oosterwijk2017choosing

-   People rated high in morbid curiosity tend to identity with the \"horror fandom\" @scrivner2021scaring; @scrivner2021psychology

-   Research indicates individuals use horror content to cope with anxiety & regulate emotions (\"Self-Trigger\") @scrivner2021scaring; @bellet2020self

-   Horror fan motivations characterized by the Horror Typology Scale @scrivner2022psychological
